column1: Reddog^/msi-geforce-rtx-2080-gaming-x-trio-8gb-gddr6-pci-express-3-0-graphics-card/6290654?variant=A&sort=MOST_HELPFUL^4^0^"MSI - GeForce RTX 2080 Gaming X Trio 8GB GDDR6 PCI Express 3.0 Graphics Card

If you are someone who is in the market for a Nvidia RTX graphic card you probably have done your research and you know the pros and cons of the new RTX product line. Nvidia RTX brings completely new technology to PC gaming and the like it or not all PC gamer are better severed because of it. New hardware features are a gamble that can take years to make its way to the software that our PC gaming is built on. There are PC game titles that do support some of the new features of the RTX graphic cards but support is not guaranteed and
column3: you should never buy technologies on promises of what it might do. It is usually wiser to buy technology that fits your needs for what you do today because in computers changes is always happening. Standards and feature found in RTX graphic cards can take years to be accepted or fade away. I applaud Nvidia for its support of PC gaming. I wish the price was lower but again when you buy at this level you should have done your research. Now what about the MSI RTX 2080 Gaming X card
column4: well its a beauty and beast. I had a GTX 1080ti and was very happy with its performance. But I was due for a major upgrade of my gaming PC and I had another place to keep the 1080ti in service so I decided to roll the dice for the MSI card. I am not going to say I am breaking new benchmarks with the RTX 2080 but I am not giving up any performance to the 1080ti either. For me this was a personnel choice to use for another three years to the next upgrade. The MSI RTX 2080 is quiet
column5: fast and looks great in my tempered glass case. I spent many days on this upgrade and I wanted a complete refresh and I certainly got it. Buy the MSI RTX Gaming X because it is in the top 3 or 4 PC gaming cards available today. Yes
column6: there are finally good options for PC Gamers again and that is great news
column7: but our hobby needs cards like this because it keeps moving the bar up and in time all PC Gamers will benefit."^5^Jan 3

column1: Deskandchiars^/lg-8x-external-usb-2-0-double-layer-dvdrw-cd-rw-drive-silver/7979483?variant=A&sort=MOST_HELPFUL^4^2^"The instructions state
column2: in pertinent part [after connecting the USB cable to your computer]

column1: 'WHEN the computer is ready
column2: confirm that the drive is detected. And
column4: insert the supplied software CD into the drive and install the software.' (emphasis added).

column1: Error 1. At least on an iMac
column2: the computer does not show the drive has been detected UNTIL a CD is inserted in the drive. Hence
column3: the first condition in the instructions above can not be met and further would seem to indicate a problem has occurred.

column1: Error 2. After returning to Best Buy to consult about error #1
column2: I was told that one need not insert the software CD at all
column3: as long as the computer is connected to the internet. This is not mentioned in the instructions.

column1: To test this advice
column2: I inserted a music CD in the drive. I never inserted the software CD at all. Upon inserting the music CD
column3: the drive was recognized and displayed on the computer screen
column4: and I uploaded the music successfully.

column1: So
column2: the experience with this drive is much different than other devices I use
column3: such as an external hard drive or thumb drives in that connecting the device to the USB port is not sufficient for the computer to register that it has detected the LG portable drive.

column1: I hope it works better than the instructions. Can't comment on that as I only had it for a day. As others have stated
column2: I only purchased this because the iMac no long comes with a CD drive integral to the computer
column3: but CDs are not (yet) obsolete. I hope I can install my turbotax CD..

column1: At least the price was not too much of a penalty."^3^Feb 20
